about.body1: Erudika is an independent software shop, based in Sofia, Bulgaria. As Eastern Europeans, we are capable of acheiving optimal results with limited resources and that's reflected in our software. We work with the latest software stacks and we know clould infrastructure well.
about.body2: We focus on security, performance, privacy, and shipping quality products. We're open to collaboration and we'd love to hear from you!

scoold.subtitle: Knowledge sharing platform you can host and brand.
scoold.description: Scoold delivers a polished Q&A experience with full ownership of your data, branding, and roadmap.

paraCloud.subtitle: Fully managed Para clusters with uptime guarantees.
paraCloud.description: Let Erudika handle provisioning, monitoring, and upgrades so your team can focus on building.
